rules.description: F1 ~ F12: Open Terminal, Chrome, Finder, etc...
F13(PrtScr): shutdown | F14(ScrLock): sleep | F15(Pause): Toggle profile

to_if_alone.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to shut down'
osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to shut down'

rules.description: LOpt, LCmd: swap in games (wow & dia3)
Spacebar(+shift): right(left) arrow in safari (for kakao page)
